entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -45.4°C
Wind: NNW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
